channel.title: npm14 on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in npm14 on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Nine panel maze
item.description:
16:09 Monday 15 December 2014 JST Actually, it’s not really a maze; there are no dead ends except for the start and finish points. It’s actually a puzzle to figure out how to connect the start and end points. Anyway, After about 4 hours of work, I’ve finished the final draft:
Now I just need to draw all the black lines on the actual panels. Shortlink for this piece https://art.

item.title: Nine panel maze
item.description:
##03:38 Monday 15 December 2014 JST## Over the weekend I worked on expanding the four pieces to a larger project. At this point it looks like this:
I haven’t got the maze planned exactly, but I want to draw a maze that spans the panels. The points at which the maze goes off the edge of panels will be aligned in a way that the panels seem to fit together in multiple ways.

item.title: made some new art pieces
item.description: ##01:27 Saturday 13 December 2014 JST## I’m not sure what to call them; they’re not really drawings, nor are they paintings.. They’ll eventually be pieces of a maze puzzle thing. I’ll draw a maze or two behind them; I drew some dots on the edges where the maze paths would cross over the different panels, but I made a mistake that will require drawing some more pieces. Maybe it was intentional so I wouldn’t have 4 pieces as a set, because four is unlucky in Japan.
